author: Richard Lawler
title: The Morning After: iPadOS 13.4 brings mouse and trackpad support
description:
Hey, good morning! You look fabulous.

Years after Apple's tablet first debuted, the iPad is finally like other computers in one important way: You can easily use it with a mouse or a trackpad. The 13.4 update that rolled out yesterday for iOS and iPadOS adde…
